desc.p: Holds the loan contract amount expressed in the currency of the FACILITY.
Holds the IDs of the loans contracts created under this facility for which this record is created
This field indicates whether schedule definition has been set at the loan contract level or not. The value of 'Y' means the schedule definition at loan contract level has been set
Holds the maturity date of the loan contract which is defined at the corresponding LOAN.ID field
Holds the loan amount expressed in the loan contract currency. This amount would be equal to the corresponding amount in the field BASE.CCY.AMT if both loan currency and facility currency are same
The currency of the loan contract defined in the corresponding LOAN.ID field is updated.
Own share amount of the loan defined at the corresponding LOAN.ID field which belongs to this facility. This amount is expressed in the currency of the Facility contract
This is the key field for this file and holds the ID of the FACILITY for which this record is created
